entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The main character mentioned in the chapter, described as having received bottom marks in a Transfiguration test and taking up goat charming.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Dumbledore's brother, mentioned as someone who also took up goat charming.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, searching for a letter and photograph.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Harry's mother, mentioned as having described a photograph in her letter.

entities.name: photo
entities.description: A torn piece of paper that Harry finds on the floor, which is most of a photograph described by Lily.

relationships.description: Harry searched for a letter and photograph related to Dumbledore.
Aberforth is the brother of Dumbledore.
